summary: All five requirements (REQ-32 through REQ-36) have been successfully implemented. The frontend adds a music style prompt input with clickable keyword suggestions in GenerationMode, and the backend extends the LyricsRequest data model with an optional stylePrompt field. The implementation includes proper state management, submission flow, and backward compatibility via a migration module.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) implementing data migration logic for adding stylePrompt to existing LyricsRequest records
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states as a non-goal: 'Implementing actual AI music generation logic (simulation only)' and does not request any data migration functionality. The migration module transforms old LyricsRequest records to include the new stylePrompt field, which was not specified in any requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: Extended keyword list beyond the minimum required keywords in StyleKeywords component
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-33 requires at least '808', 'Auto-Tune', 'deep bass', 'male voice', 'female voice' but the implementation includes 15 additional keywords ('reverb', 'distortion', 'trap', 'R&B', 'pop', 'rock', 'hip-hop', 'electronic', 'acoustic', 'melodic', 'aggressive', 'smooth', 'upbeat', 'slow tempo', 'fast tempo') that were not requested. While some were mentioned as examples in REQ-33, the requirement only mandates the five listed keywords.
